articles.description: Real Madrid have been crowned the Spanish Super Cup champions after an eight year absence from the final, holding off Athletic Bilbao in Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
Forever young Luca Modric bossed the Spanish Super Cup final and scored the first goal in Real Madrid's 2-0 win over Athletic Bilbao.
It was with a prodigious swish of his right foot on 38 minutes t… [+3500 chars]

articles.title: Highlights - Northampton Saints v Ulster Rugby Round 3 Heineken Champions Cup Rugby 2021/22 - Heineken Champions Cup & EPCR Challenge Cup
articles.description: Ulster Rugby held off a late scare from Northampton Saints to remain unbeaten and qualify for the Round of 16.The very best of European Rugby go head to head...
